original_text: “Brother will betray brother to death, and a father his child; children will rebel against their parents and have them put to death.
korean_text: 장차 형제가 형제를, 아버지가 자식을 죽는 데에 내주며 자식들이 부모를 대적하여 죽게 하리라

sentences.original_text: Brother will betray brother to death
children will rebel against their parents
and have them put to death
